thread.title: Lauretta Gray
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Lauretta Gray

author: Lauretta Gray
title: Lauretta Gray
text: Erika went above and beyond to get the right stone for me! It's gorgeous and I just had it appraised at 25% more than I paid! All specifications we exactly as stated. Super happy would not hesitate to recommend to friends and family. I hope to be a repeat customer.
